visions.building_vision_description: Muda a visibilidade das paredes, permitindo ver dentro das construções.
visions.terrain_slice_vision_description: Corte o terreno, permitindo que você veja estruturas subterrâneas. Altere a elevação para ver diferentes fatias.
visions.terrain_xray_vision_description: Veja através do terreno. Mude entre a vista completa e plana para mostrar paredes subterrâneas.

promotion_tree.title: Escolha um Trabalho
promotion_tree.text_1: Em honra de esforços firmes e de resiliência,
promotion_tree.text_current: Este é o trabalho atual do hearthling.

build_workshop.title: Build Workshop
build_workshop.create_stockpile_description:
The crafter will store crafted goods in this stockpile.

You probably want to place it near the workbench, but hey, it's your decision.

build_workshop.page2_subtitle2: Click and drag on the ground to place the stockpile

release_pet_confirm_dialog.title: Soltar o animal de estimação
release_pet_confirm_dialog.message: Tem certeza de que deseja liberar este animal de estimação de volta ao estado selvagem? Você não será capaz de recuperá-lo.
release_pet_confirm_dialog.accept: Eu não quero mais este animal.

camera.camera_pan_1: Hold down the space bar, then move the mouse

party.title: Grupos
party.party_help: Party members will travel together and can be directed on the battlefield.
party.party_editor_help: Use this screen to add and remove hearthlings to the party.
party.attack_banner_button_help: Tell the party to assault a location
party.defend_banner_button_help: Tell the party to rally to a location when Town Defense Mode is activated

attack_target.description: Attack a specific target or location.

move_unit.description: Move to a location without attacking.

manage_party.description: Add and remove combat units from the party.

town_menu.description: General information about your town, how your hearthlings are feeling, and the wealth you've accumulated!

citizen_manager.description: Manage your hearthlings and promote them to new jobs.

harvest_menu.description: Harvest resources or mine into the earth.

harvest.description: Gather trees, plants, and stones from the surface of the land

harvest.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

mine_block.tip_title: Click and drag to dig downward

clear_item.confirm_title: Are you really sure you want to clear these items?
clear_item.confirm_message: Usable items in the area will be permanently destroyed

zone_menu.description: Designate areas of the ground for storage, farming, etc.

create_stockpile.description: Place a stockpile for storing resources.
create_stockpile.tip_title: Click and drag to create your stockpile
create_stockpile.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

create_farm.tip_title: Click and drag to designate a new field

create_trapping_grounds.description: Coloque Armadilhar para capturar pequenos bichos.
create_trapping_grounds.tip_title: Click and drag to create trapping grounds

building_templates.description: Choose to construct a building from a pre-designed template

place_item.description: Place items like furniture and decoration

Click to manually place a ladder to access hard to reach areas.

town_alert.description: Rally your hearthlings to prepare for intruders!
town_alert.activated_text: Your hearthlings are vigilantly watching for intruders. Non-combat hearthlings will run to safety points.

party_1.description: Direct hearthlings with combat jobs into battle! Promoted combat units are automatically added here.
party_1.tip_title: The party is selected in the unit frame.
party_1.tip_description: Use the commands in the unit frame to direct the people in the party.

party_2.description: Direct hearthlings with combat jobs into battle! Use the unit frame controls to manage the party.
party_2.tip_title: The party is selected in the unit frame.
party_2.tip_description: Use the commands in the unit frame to direct the people in the party.

blacksmith.description: Smelt ore for weapons and armor.

cook.description: Makes food taste better and last longer.

potter.description: Makes bricks and goods from clay.

bulletin_manager.description: Important notifications about the world and your town

shop.shopkeeper_not_enough_gold_tooltip: Shopkeeper does not have enough gold

tooltips.food: Higher quality food provides higher food scores.
tooltips.morale: Keep your hearthlings safe, well-fed, and comfortable to improve morale.
tooltips.net_worth: Estimated value of your town. Collect items, accumulate gold and build buildings to increase your net worth.

inventory_full.title: Town Items Full
inventory_full.message: You've reached the maxiumum number of items! Each hearthling increases the total number of items your town can have. Hearthlings will not harvest resources if their town owns too many items. Storage containers count as items and do NOT increase your item limit. Sell off the extra items or destroy them using the clear item tool.

overhead_tips.wall_segment_tip_title: Click to place freestanding wall segments
overhead_tips.wall_segment_tip_description: Hold down SHIFT while clicking to draw connected walls
overhead_tips.build_floor_tip_title: Click and drag to place floor tiles
overhead_tips.build_slab_tip_title: Click and drag to build a slab
overhead_tips.erase_structure_tip_title: Click to erase items. Click and drag to erase floor
overhead_tips.roof_tip_title: Click a walled floorplan to place the roof
overhead_tips.raise_walls_tip_title: Click a floorplan to add walls
overhead_tips.doodad_tip_title: Click a wall to place the door or window
overhead_tips.build_road_tip_title: Click and drag to build road
overhead_tips.stairs_tip_description: Right click to exit. Rotate with , and . keys

building_templates.title: Modelos de Construção
building_templates.set_template_name_prompt: Enter a name for this template

remove_template_confirm.title: Delete Template
remove_template_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this building template?

start_building_confirm.title: Really start building?
start_building_confirm.message: Once you begin building this structure cannot be edited or removed! Are you sure you want to build now?

remove_building_confirm.title: Really remove this building
remove_building_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove this entire building?

farm.fallow_description: Plant no crop and let the soil renew itself.

mining.help: Mining allows you to create underground rooms and corridors. You can also discover resources while digging.

trapping_grounds.help: Trappers will place traps in a trapping grounds and will periodically check to see if anything has been caught.

pasture.help: Shepherds bring animals to this region and tend to their needs here.
pasture.sheep_pasture_description: Sheep produce wool, used by the weaver. Slaughtering sheep will produce mutton, a raw cooking ingredient
pasture.rabbit_pasture_description: Rabbits reproduce quickly and can be slaughtered for jerky and pelts
pasture.poyo_pasture_description: Poyos produce eggs, a valuable cooking ingredient. Slaughtering poyo will yield meat and, occasionally, feathers for crafting

stockpile.help: Click the icons to choose what to store in this stockpile.

filters.tooltip_refined_animal_part: goods produced from bits of animals

show_workshop.maintain_option_disabled: Build a stockpile or place a crate to unlock more crafting options!

journal.default_message: Ainda não existem entradas no diário!
journal.gripe_empty: Whoa. I guess nobody has anything to gripe about.

about.title: Sobre Stonehearth
about.attributions: The following is a list of OpenSource Software that is used in Stonehearth:

tips.000: If your workers get stuck in a mine, you can build a ladder to get them out!
tips.001: Your hearthlings will get a better night's sleep if you provide beds for them.
tips.002: Build pens around your pastures to make sure shepherded animals stay put.
tips.003: Stockpiles can be changed to hold specific kinds of items.
tips.004: You can farm silkweed for a steady supply of thread fiber.
tips.005: A well fed town is a happy town.
tips.006: Use the < and > keys to rotate an item or building before placing it.
tips.007: Your hearthlings move faster on roads.
tips.008: The weaver can craft new uniforms that increases the effectiveness of your workers.
tips.009: Sitting during a meal helps with digestion. Build tables and chairs for your hearthlings.
tips.010: Shepherds will automatically find sheep to fill a pasture.
tips.011: If you want a higher net worth, try selling your items to a merchant for gold.
tips.012: Resources and Food do not contribute to your town net worth.
tips.013: The curiosity attribute increases experience gain.
tips.014: Fine items have a higher net worth than their normal versions.
tips.015: The net worth of an item is its sell value.
tips.016: You can use a tunnel door to block off your mining tunnel entrances.
tips.017: Don't want your hearthlings to leave town? The Engineer can make a lockable door.
tips.018: Settlers with a high Mind attribute will make good crafters.
tips.019: Place food stockpiles closer to work areas so it's easier for your hearthlings to access food.
tips.020: Trappers can set traps in the mountains and the desert, but there are fewer critters there.
tips.021: You can disable a combat unit's job in the Citizens panel to force them to take a rest from fighting.
tips.022: Mining dirt will occasionally yield clay and stone.
tips.023: You can visually see ore veins in the side of mountains.
tips.024: Need a starting food source? Move Berry Bushes or Prickly Pear Cacti closer to your town.
tips.025: After defeating the Goblin Chieftain, you can claim Bluebell the sheep as your own.
tips.026: Your hearthlings don't like being in cramped spaces for too long.
tips.027: Farm animals can reproduce if there are at least 2 of the same animals in a pen.

select_settlement.title: Clique no mapa para escolher o local do seu acampamento

terrain_stats.trees_and_plants_description: Wood is a primary building resource. You will need some in order to build your buildings and craft items like beds, tables, and chairs.
terrain_stats.wildlife_description: Local wildlife can be hunted for food and raw crafting materials.
terrain_stats.minerals_description: You will need minerals if you plan on building things from stone or metal.

settings.title: Configurações
settings.force_32_bit_note: * Force 32-bit apenas se for absolutamente necessario.64-bit e mais rapido e suporta grandes cidades.
settings.send_anon_data: Mande FeedBack Anonimo para ajudar a melhorar o Stonehearth!

gameplay_tab.title: Jogabilidade
gameplay_tab.experimental_description: Estas definições estão em desenvolvimento e pode não esta estavel! Ative a seu provrio risco!
gameplay_tab.enable_speed_3_note: Nota: O desempenho pode ser comprometido com as cidades maiores. esteja avisado!
gameplay_tab.enable_speed_3_description: Adds a new speed option in the bottom right panel that will run the game at 4x speed!
gameplay_tab.default_storage_filter_none_description: When creating a new stockpile or putting down a new crate, the default filter on the storage will be set to 'None' instead of 'All'
gameplay_tab.show_hearthling_paths_description: Display the path your hearthlings are following.
gameplay_tab.randomize_attributes_description: If enabled, hearthling Mind, Body, and Spirit attributes will be assigned completely at random instead of distributed in a balanced fashion.
gameplay_tab.auto_loot_description: When an enemy drops loot, automatically mark it for pick up.
gameplay_tab.building_auto_queue_crafters_description: When starting construction on a building, all furniture and fixtures for that building are automatically queued for their respective crafters.

mods_tab.title: Módulos Instalado
mods_tab.note: Abilitar Ou Desabilitar um Módulo Requer Reinicio.

mods_changed_dialog.title: Mudar Modulo
mods_changed_dialog.message: O jogo precisa recarregar para aplicar as alterações do módulo. Reiniciar agora?

title_screen.patch_notes:
Ver Notas de Atualização
Modulo Idioma pt-BR v0.4 (A21-R707,A22-R721)

alpha_welcome_dialog.title: Bem vindo a Stonehearth!
alpha_welcome_dialog.message:
Atenção: this is Alpha quality software. It's missing many features, and you can expect to encounter bugs as you play.

You can help by automatically sending us anonymous gameplay data and crash reports from your game.

mod_conflic_dialog.title: Detectado Modulos em Conflito!
mod_conflic_dialog.message: Atenção: Your mods directory contains both a .smod and a flat folder of some mods. The flat folder mod will be used by the game. This mod will become out of date when the .smod is updated and cause bugs. The affected mods are:

select_game_story.title: Escolha a sua Aventura
select_game_story.kingdom_section_start: ... Um bravo grupo de colonos, os
select_game_story.biome_section_start: Em busca de novas terras e aventuras, eles partem para
select_game_story.game_mode_select_start: , Um local que é certeza de ser

normal.description: Aventure-se em um mundo repleto de perigo. Sua cidade estará sujeita a ataques de inimigos.
normal.post_selection_text: um lugar inspirador para começar de novo.

peaceful.description: Um modo de criação, onde você está livre para construir sua cidade sem se preocupar com quaisquers invasores.
peaceful.post_selection_text: um lugar tranquilo para começar de novo.

hard.description: Enfrente monstros mais difíceis do que o modo normal
hard.post_selection_text: um lugar assustador para começar de novo.

select_game_story.biome_warning_text:
Crafting resources can be hard to find when choosing The Ascendancy to settle in the Desert Biome or Rayya?s Children in the Temperate Biome. An issue we hope to fix soon.

Do you still want to continue with your current selection?

post_bug.title: Filing bugs
post_bug.message: Thanks for participating in the Stonehearth Alpha! Here's how you can file a bug.
post_bug.file_bug_step_2: Check the list of active topics, and if your bug hasn't already been reported, create a new topic
post_bug.file_bug_step_3: When filing bugs, please be sure to include all the information requested in the report, and copy the text of all engine errors. Screenshots for visual bugs are also helpful.
post_bug.file_bug_step_4: If you're encountering a crashing bug, please check out http://discourse.stonehearth.net/t/13297 for common solutions, and how to get support for crashes. Below is your unique user id:

error_dialog_js.title: UI Error
error_dialog_js.reset_hint: Press F5 to Reset the UI.

bullet_points.000: Each point increases max health by 1

inventiveness.description: How good this hearthling is at creating things. Good inventors are more likely to create fine craftables.

bullet_points.000: Every 2 points increases chance to craft a fine item by 1%

shelter.description: Make sure your hearthlings have a comfortable bed to sleep in.
shelter.town_description: How your citizens feel about their lodging situation. Are there beds to sleep in?

compassion.description: How likely this hearthling will help out a fellow villager or befriend others.

bullet_points.002: Every 10 points increases direct healing amount by 1

food.description: Make sure foods of different variety and quality are available. Cooked foods are more liked than raw foods.
food.town_description: How your citizens feel about the town's food situation. Is there enough to eat? Try to obtain a variety of foods!

diligence.description: How long this hearthling can work before needing rest.

willpower.description: How likely this hearthling is to resist enemy charms.

net_worth.description: A reflection of the prosperity of your town. Buildings, inventory, and agriculture combine to form this score.

courage.description: How brave this hearthling is in the face of combat.

bullet_points.000: Determines chance to flee in combat
Every 10 muscle increases weapon damage by 1

happiness.town_description: How happy your citizens are overall.

body.description: A Competencia em atividades fisicas. Hearthlings com um elevado status do corpo vai se mover mais rapido. Influencias muscular, velocidade e resistencia.

edibles.description: The gold value of all the food in the town's inventory.
edibles.town_description: The gold value of all the food in the town's inventory

mind.description: A Capacidade de pensar de forma inteligente. A estatistica alta em Mente permite um hearthling a exercer tarefas mentais complexas. Influencias Concentração, Curiosidade e Inventividade.

curiosity.description: How much this hearthling enjoys new experiences.

bullet_points.000: Every 10 curiosity increases bonus experience earned by 1

spirit.description: A fe em outras pessoas. Um hearthling de eapirito elevado pode fazer amizade com os aoutros facilmente e ficar forte contra os inimigos. Influencia Coragem, Força de Vontade e Compaixão .

safety.description: Protect your town from raiders and make your citizens feel safe by assigning guards.
safety.town_description: How your citizens feel about the town's security. Is the town well protected or getting pillaged by goblins?

inventory.description: The gold value of all non-Resource and non-Edible items in the town inventory.

buildings.description: The value of all the buildings constructed your town. Large buildings will have slightly higher score contributions than small ones.

agriculture.description: The value of farming fields and pastures in your town. Each planted crop and each pasture animal contributes to the score.

military_strength.description: A value that reflects how strong your town is militarily. Combat units and equipped weapons and armor contribute to this score.

content.town_description: Your citizens are satisfied with the way things have been going.

jubilant.town_description: Your citizens are incredibly happy living here!

forlorn.town_description: Your citizens have been having an incredibly hard time lately.

glum.town_description: Your citizens aren't feeling great, overall.

exp_bar.description: This hearthling's progress to next level.

suspend_button.description: Pausar ou resumir o Tipo de Trabalho.

change_gender.description: Clique para mudar o género deste hearthling para [str(gender)].

customization_lock.description: This hearthling's [str(customization)] will be saved during trait and stat rerolls.

customization_lock_all.description: Click to lock all name and appearance options.

customization_unlock_all.description: Click to unlock all name and appearance options.
